ios.sim.debug.build: RN_SRC_EXT=e2e.js xcodebuild -workspace ios/myapp.xcworkspace -scheme myapp -configuration Debug -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build -destination id=2875012C-CC60-4418-B37D-D9B88013CD8A

android.emu.debug.build: cd android && RN_SRC_EXT=e2e.js ./gradlew assembleDebug assembleAndroidTest -DtestBuildType=debug && cd ..
